Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the use of automated decision tools by landlords for making housing decisions
Summary: Relates to the use of automated decision tools by landlords for making housing decisions; sets conditions and rules for use of such tools.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to the use of automated housing decision making tools to make housing decisions
